text: The Assembly of Kosovo (, Skup≈°tina Kosova) is an institution linked to governing the territory of Kosovo. The Assembly was created by the United Nations to provide for a democratic form of government. == Structure == The assembly has 120 seats. 100 seats are filled with people directly elected into the assembly. The remaining 20 are always assigned as follows: * 10 seats for the representatives of the Serbs. * 4 seats for the representatives of the Roma, Ashkali and Egyptians. * 3 seats for the Bosniaks. * 2 seats for the Turks. * 1 seat for the Gorans. Category:Politics of Kosovo Kosovo Kosovo
title: Assembly of Kosovo
